kbarticletemplate.name: Procedure
kbarticletemplate.description: Use this template to create a procedure that defines the steps for resolving a specific problem.

kbarticletemplate.name: Question & Answer
kbarticletemplate.description: Use this template to create a question and answer pair for a specific problem or situation.

kbarticletemplate.name: Solution to a Problem
kbarticletemplate.description: Use this template to provide a solution to a specific problem.

kbarticletemplate.name: Standard KB Article
kbarticletemplate.description: Use this template to provide general information about a subject.
